text: Jonathan Ávila Martínez (born 1 November 1991) is a Colombian footballer who plays as a centre-back for Atlético Grau in the Peruvian Primera División. ==Honours== ===Club=== ;Junior *Copa Colombia (1): 2017 ==External links== * Category:Living people Category:1991 births Category:People from Bucaramanga Category:Colombian footballers Category:Colombian expatriate footballers Category:Categoría Primera A players Category:Categoría Primera B players Category:Peruvian Primera División players Category:La Equidad footballers Category:Atlético Bucaramanga footballers Category:Alianza Petrolera players Category:Atlético Junior footballers Category:Atlético Grau footballers Category:Association football central defenders Category:Colombian expatriate sportspeople in Peru Category:Expatriate footballers in Peru
title: Jonathan Ávila Martínez
